resources.string: Learn mode selected. Touch it again to begin.
Practice mode selected. Touch it again to begin.
Exit selected. Touch it again to exit.
Main menu. Learn button is at the top of the screen. Practice button is lower right. Exit button is lower left.
Wellcome to braille souls accessible edition
Drag your finger through the screen to recognize the symbols pattern. A beep indicates that you have changed the braille dot. Vibration indicates that the dot belongs to the current symbol.
Double tap to go forward. Long press to go backward. Tap with two fingers to go back to the main menu.
Touch anywhere in the screen creating the braille pattern of the symbol.
Long press to confirm. Tap with two fingers to go back to the main menu.
